title: Person of Interest 2015 New York Comic-Con Sizzle Reel
author: Warner Bros. TV
comment: Amy freaking nailed this she even got Finch's head turn down
Amy Acker is impeccable as Reese and Harold.

I DIED HAPPpY. 
"One at a time, in, Or...der". And Dat Harold hairflip!
The machine just wanted a whole world of Root.
still one of the most underrated shows out there. so creativ, so intelligent, so cool. fuckin love it
Looks like that could have been fun for the actors.
description:
Person of Interest made their fifth appearance at New York Comic Con this weekend! Fans in attendance had the chance to attend a panel with series stars, Jim Caviezel, Michael Emerson, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi as well as executive producer Greg Plageman, executive producer Chris Fisher and producer Margot Lulick, and were treated to a sneak peek from season 5. Not to worry if you couldn't make it to NYCC, you can watch right here! Person of Interest returns to
CBS midseason.
